sentences.en: a lotion to make your skin feel soft and smooth
sentences.cn: 能使皮肤柔软光滑的护肤液

sentences.en: a lotion to normalize oily skin
sentences.cn: 使油性皮肤恢复正常的护肤液

sentences.en: A skin lotion distilled from the root is a marvellous cure for sore rashes and spots.
sentences.cn: 从这种根部提取的护肤液是治疗皮疹和丘疹的极好药物。

sentences.en: For super-soft skin, lather on a light body lotion before you bathe.
sentences.cn: 皮肤极柔嫩者，可在沐浴前涂上温和的护肤露。

sentences.en: Regular use of a body lotion will keep the skin soft and supple.
sentences.cn: 经常使用润肤露可使皮肤柔软而富有弹性。

sentences.en: She applied calamine lotion to her sunburn.
sentences.cn: 他在晒斑上涂了一些炉甘石搽液.

sentences.en: She plastered herself from head to toe in high factor sun lotion.
sentences.cn: 她给自己从头到脚都抹上了强效防晒露。

sentences.en: She playfully rubs suntan lotion on his neck.
sentences.cn: 她开玩笑地把防晒露擦到他脖子上。

sentences.en: She smeared sun tan lotion all over herself.
She smoothed the lotion across his shoulder blades.
sentences.cn: 她在他的肩胛骨上抹了乳液。

sentences.en: The lotion cools and refreshes the skin.
sentences.cn: 这种润肤液凉爽清新，能够焕发肌肤的活力。

sentences.en: The lotion moisturizes while it cleanses.
sentences.cn: 这种乳液具有清洁和润肤的功效。

sentences.en: The lotion should be applied sparingly to the skin.
sentences.cn: 这种洗液应均匀地涂在皮肤上.

sentences.en: This luxurious talcum lotion restores softness and suppleness to dehydrated skin.
sentences.cn: 这种奢侈的滑石润肤露能使缺水的皮肤恢复柔软与弹性。

sentences.en: You notice? The whole house smells of shaving lotion.
sentences.cn: 你闻见了 吗 ?整个屋子都是刮胡子膏的味儿.

phrases.tran_cn: 润肤露；身体乳液；润肤霜
保湿美颜乳；保湿营养乳液

trans.tran_en: a liquid mixture that you put on your skin or hair to clean,  soften  , or protect it
